body.ab:
tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i Ti ka legs bshad bsdus pa slob dpon gtsang nag pas mdzad pa bzhugs s+ho ||
i dra sa(dra sa) SHakya b+hikSHu ku ma ra SHrI pustaM pra ma Na bi ni SH+ca(SH+ca/s+tsa) ya sya TI ka A tsarya virya sing ha sya kA ra: ||Skt: idam? śākyabhikṣu-kumāra-śrī pustaṃ pramāṇaviniścayasya ṭīkā ācārya-vīryasiṃhasya kārāḥ. Kumāraśrī (=Tib. gzhon nu dpal) could possibly be 'Gos lo tsA ba bZhon nu dpal.This is the book of the shakya monk Kumarashri (Tib. gZhon nu dpal), a commentary on the Pramāṇaviniścaya, a composition of the master Viryasiṃha (=brTson 'grus seng ge)

tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i ti ka legs par bshad pa bsdus papa' zhes bya ba |
bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo ||Commentary on the Pramāṇaviniścaya – a summary of eloquent elucidations. I bow down to the Illustrious Mañjughoṣa.

lg.l: gang zhig nyes pa kun bral chos rnams la ||
ye shes spyan dangdang {ldan pa'} thugs rje'i gsung dbyangs kyis ||
legs 'dod skye bo don la mi slu ba'i ||

'jug yul ston pa
de la phyag 'tshal lo ||

ab.note: I bow down to the one who teaches the object of engagement that is non-erroneous with regard to what is meaningful (for) people who wish well. Thanks to the eye of wisdom with regard to the phenomena devoid of all faults and the voice of compassion.

lg.l: de lta'i gzhung 'di skye bo blo gros phyogs can gyis ||
tshig don ma bshad tshig dang don 'ga' bshad pa dang |
log par bshad dang skabs don gzhung las 'khyams bshad kyis ||
shes 'dod rnams kyi dus dang sgra blo gron gyur byas ||

ab.note: (Regarding) this text that is such, partially intelligent people have not explained the meaning of the words, Or have explained some of the words and meaning, or have explained them incorrectly, or have explained the context in deviating from the text. Because of this, the time and words and intelligence of those who wish to know have been consumed.

lg.l: rnam bshad don gyi ro dang nus pa mi shes par ||
grags pa'i sgra las che ba'i rlung du mngon rgyug pas ||

gzhan zer skye bo lung brgya'i rnyog chus ngoms
pa bdag ||
legs bshad bkod ma yan lag brgyad ldan 'di mi 'thung ||

ab.note: Because they follow, running, a wind that is bigger than renown words Without knowing the taste and quality (or strength, nus pa) of the meaning of the explanation Those who quench their thirst with the polluted water of the hundred instructions of people who (all) say something else Do not drink the spring-water of the eloquent elucidations which has eight attributes (of good water).

lg.l: gang dag rjod tshogs snying por mi byed kyi ||
gzhung gis bstan pa'i don gzhung nges 'dod pa ||
de dag tshig 'gas don mang rab gsal ba'i ||
rigs bshad snying po 'di la ngo mtshar lta ||

ab.note: Those who do not take to heart the collections of discourses, But hope to ascertain the meaning taught in the texts (and) the texts, Should marvel at this (commentary) that is the essence of logical explanation, That clarifies many meanings by means of few words.

lg.l: gang ma mthong pas srid par 'khyams gyur pa ||
bdag la shes bya'i gnas la gnas nyid bzhin ||
lta byed tshad ma'i myig gnyis sbyin mdzad pa'i ||
rgyal mtshungs bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo ||

ab.note: I bow down to the bla mas, who are like Victorious ones, Who bestowed the two eyes of valid cognition that make one see The nature of objects of cognition as it is To me, who was roaming in existence because of not seing.

lg.l: gang zhig dngos stobs blo yis dngos rnams la ||
log lta'i gzhung rnams rab 'jig dngos nyid dang ||
ston pa'i gsung don nges byed rigs pa'i tshul ||
rnam nges mdzad pa de 'dir rgyal gyur cig ||

ab.note: May the one who composed the Pramāṇaviniścaya be here victorious! (The Pramāṇaviniścaya) that destroys the traditions of mistaken views about entities by a mind (that conforms to) the force of reality, which has a method of reasoning that ascertains what is real and the meaning of the words of the teacher.

body.ab:
de dag rjes
zhugs dpyad la ltos myed par ||
rnam 'jig sdud dang gzhung don gsal byed pas ||
ston de'i dgongs pa bde blag nges 'gyur ba'i ||
legs bshad bsdus pa'i ti ka bdag gis bya ||I will compose a commentary that is the Summary of eloquent elucidations Such that the intention of this teacher can be ascertained easily, Without depending on the analysis of those who follow the former, By including their destruction and clarifying the meaning of the text.
rnam par nges papa' ni lus lta bu'i bstan bcos bar ma ste | gzhung cung zad bsdus pas tshad ma nyid kyi lus tshang par gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir ro ||
gzhung 'di ni rtsom pa la 'jug pa klad kyi don dang | brtsam par bya ba skabs kyi don dang | mthar phyin pa 'jug gi don gsum gyis nges par bya ba las |

snga rabs pa dag mtshan nyid kyi skyon mtshon bya la ltos te mi srid pa dang ma khyab khyab ches gsum las myed par sems pa de dag ni khyab mnyam pa'i don ldog gzhan pa dang rang ldog rdzas su ma grub pa skyon du bsgrub pas
gnod par lta'o ||

de la snang la ma nges pa'i mtshan nyid ni kha cig An annotation in the manuscript of mTshur ston's Tshad ma shes rab sgron ma identifies the proponent as "rtag pa," which we understand to refer to sTag. See Hugon (ed.) 2004: 21, n. 30 snang yang nges pa 'dren mi nus pa zhes zer ba ni 'dir blo rnams yul cig la ltos nas
tha dad par 'jog pa yin no ||

dang po ni kha cig tshu rol mthong pa rnams ni yul dang dus dang skye mched ma phye bar gang la zhen pa drangs pa'i don la mi slu bas tshad mar 'gyur ba yin ste | zhen pa ni tshad ma'i byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro || de lta ma yin na 'gro ba na spyad pa'i don thob pa'i mi slu ba nyid mi srid par 'gyur te mthong pa'i dngos po rnams
'jug par gzo' ba na 'gag pa'i phyir ro || de lta yin dang me dang chu'i kha dog 'dzin pa ni tsha ba dang gsher ba'i zhen pa 'dren pa nyid kyis reg pa la tshad ma yin no zhes zer ro || This corresponds to the position of rNgog lo tsa ba de ni mi rung ste | don myong pa'i stobs kyis rtogs pa myed pa'i phyir ro ||
snga rab pa pa'i 'dod pa rjes su brjod pa dang | sgrub bya sgrub byed kyi don nyid ngos gzung pa dang | de rang gi gzhung lugs smra ba rnams la sbyar ba'o ||

chen po dag ni sgrub pa 'brel pa gnyis la rten pas dbye ba'i tshul ci 'dra ba myed pas sam | mi dmigs pa'i sgrub bya med dgag la dbye' ba myed pa sam | dbye bsdu' byas kyang gsum gyi grangs
nges la gnod pa myed te mngon sum bzhir phye bas tshad ma'i grangs nges la mi gnod pa bzhin no zhes zer ro ||
kho bo cag rtags mi 'khrul pa'i spyi khyab de nyid la 'brel par brjod pa'i yang phyir ro ||

re shig thal ba'i phyogs chos khas blangs dang bzlog pa'i bsgrub bya shes 'dod gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang par gnad gcig ste | du badu ma 'gog pa'i rgyu
mi dmyigs pa'i thal ba dang me bsgrub pa'i 'bras rtags kyi rang rgyud kyi dbang du byas te la la me myed du log pas smra na gnyis ka tshang la me tshad mas grub na gnyis ka ma tshang ba'i phyir ro || thal ba'i bsal pa dang bzlog pa'i rtags gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang par gnad gcig ste | la la du ba mthong na gnyis ka la tshang la ma mthong
na gnyis ka ma tshang ba'i phyir ro ||
thal ba dang bzlog pa'i khyab pa gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang par gnad gcig ste | thal ba'i khyab pa me myed du medme kho na la yod par bsgrub na du yod la me myed medme myed pas du yod la mye yodmyed pa rang rgyud kyi khyab pa grub cing | rang rgyud kyi khyab pa {du yod (Ms om.)} me yod kho na la yod pa grub na yang me myed la myed pas 160b5 me myed la du ba myed pa thal ba'i khyab pa grub pas tshang par gcig pa'i phyir dang | la la tsan dan gyi me myed pas du med du thal bar brjod na thal ba dang bzlog pa gnyis ka'i khyab pa sha pa'i mer zhig pas ma tshang par gcig pa'i phyir ro || de la phyogs chos dang shes 'dod ma tshang pa ni me mthong pa'i tshang bang du bkod na 'byung zhing
bsal ba dang gtan tshigs ma tshang pa ni du ba ma mthong pa'i rgya mtshor bkod na 'byung la khyab pa gnyis ma tshang pa ni me mthong yang tsan dan gyi me myed par rtogs pa'i la la bkod 'byung pas ma tshang pa'i skyon drug ni gzhi gsum la 'byung pa yin no || la la du ba mthong yang me myed du rtog pas me myed la du med du thal ba
brjod na tshang pa'i yon tan drug gzhi cig la 'du bas thal ba yon tan drug ldan gyis rang rgyud chos drug ldan 'phel ba nyid do zhes bya ba snga rabs pa'i rnam pa gzhag pa'o ||
dang rang tshig gis bsal pa gnyis kyi khyad par ni snga rabs pa dag yid ches pa'i gang zag gzhan gyi tshig dang rgol ba rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba la 'jog go ||

snga rabs pa'i lugs 'chad pa na yid ches pa'i gang zag dang de'i tshig don gyi 'bras bu dang 'bras bu'i rtags kyis bzlog pa sel pa gsum
bdag gam zhes dang de'i zhes dang rang gi (P294b43) zhes pa ste | bdag dang gzhan ni rang tshig dang khas blangs kyi gang zag yin pas nus pa yang gegs sam gnod par byed do zhes sbyar ro ||

lung thams cad du tshad ma yid ma yin nam ces pa'i lan du lung tshad ma bsam par bshad zin to ces bya ste | bshad pa slob dpon
gyis yin kyang snga rabs pa pas de ltar 'dod par dgongs pa'o ||
snga rabs pa'i lugs brjod pa dang khyad par myed pa rang gi lugs gnyis gzhung lugs ces dang 'di la yang (P296b1) ces pa'o ||

lg.l:
rigs pa'i dbang phyug rgol
ba ngan 'joms thub pa'i dbang pos lung bstan gang ||
ston pa'i bstan la mkhas pa'i ming rgyal dag gis ma smad zing ||
'jug yul kun la rang lugs 'dzin skye bo kun kyi dbang gyur pa'i ||

bla med de ni gling mchog 'di na
chos rje lta bur grags pa yin ||
mtha' gnyis myed par gsum du 'khor zhing ||
mi bzad sdug bsngal rtag ldan ba ||
thabs myed nyid dang thabs gzhan dag gis shin tu zhi bar mi nus la ||
blo gros snying po gzig nyid de yang gang zhig myed par mi 'byung pa'i ||
rigs tshul 'di ni thar pa'i lam la mi snang pa seng ge yin |
gsum las bskyed de khyad par rnam bcad pas ||

tshad ma'i ngo bo gangs
dang brjod pa la ||
log rtogs brgyal phrag bsal nas rigs pa'i don ||
rnam pa res pa'i thub pa'i rgyal mtshan yin ||
mdo' don gang la byed don brgyas ldan pa don gyi gang ||
rab sbyar pa skye bo'i sgra blo'i yang dag ldan rnams kyis ||
rnam par bshad pa che 'bris bsdus pa'i 'od dag gis ||
rang gi phyogs su zla 'od tsam zhig snang bar kyag ||

de nas ring nas smon lam
stobs kyis 'di 'ongs ste ||
gang ri'i skye bo blo gyi myig ldan pa stong dag gis ||
phyogs cig blo yis gzhung dang don gyis cha shas las ||
spyad mi rim pa don tshul rgya mtsho' gnyis ma 'gyur ||
du mtha' thos ma rnam spyad blo gros can ||
dpal ldan dge' slong seng ge'i sgra can gyis ||
dab gas goms dang gzhan la phan don du ||
smad kyi rnams bshad de bas so ||
bsod nams 'di yis 'di la rab brten nas |
brtson ldan blo gros dman pa'i skye bos kyang ||
rnam par nges pa nges ste shes bya'i ||
de nyis myur du rtogs nas grol 'gyur yin ||

body.ab:
tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i ti ka legs par bshad pa bsdus
pa zhes bya ba || rigs par smra ba'i dge slong brtson 'grus seng ges sbyar pa'o || rdzogs s+ho || i thi ||
